page.title: 07Gwen The Cook
page.content: Do you use any machines? No. Do you think the school dinners are good ? Yes. What kind of things do you do? Mixture of jobs. Do you like your job? Yes. Do you have lots of friends? Yes. Are the children rude or polite? A bit. Do the children eat the dinners? Most. Do you have nasty remarks in letters? Yes. Is it a boring life or is it intresting? Interesting. Do you have to eat the dinners? Yes. Is it good for you? Yes. Do they leave a big mess? Yes. Do you get really angry with them? Yes. What sort of things do you do in the kitchen? Washing up and drying up. Do you have good pay? Sort of. Do you know lots of children? Yes. Is there lots of fighting? No.
